content:
Our new daily podcast gives you context and clarity on the stories shaping your world

DESPITE A relative lack of experience Beto O'Rourke is already raking in donations for his newly launched presidential bid. We look at the source of his appeal. Also, palm oil is found in many consumer goods but comes at a high environmental cost. And does the field of economics have a culture that is off-putting to women? Runtime: 21 min.

Listen on: Apple Podcasts | Spotify  | Google  |  Stitcher  |  TuneIn

在即将到来的总统竞选中这一丑闻必然对他不利。

eg2: Sometimes, I dress like a lawn guy and carry a .
有时候，我拿一个耙子想一个修正草坪的家伙。
And I believe, from what I know of him, he was a bit of a . We bivouacked together on and off for nearly two years.
另外以我对他的了解，这是个有点浪子气息的家伙，我们偶尔一起出去露营，这种事持续了大概两年。
We have the correspondence of the heroine with her friend, and of the villain with a fellow , so we can see how these combatants are deceived by each other.
我们拥有女主人公与她朋友以及浪子与一个恶棍的往来信件，因此，我们可以看到这些斗士如何互相欺骗。

Title: Beto O’Rourke’s presidential hopes, palm oil’s hidden cost and women in economics
